english.segment1: Here is my heart. I give it lord to you. Here is my life. I lay it before you. Where else could i go. And what else could i do. If i did not know you
english.segment2: How deeply i need you my lord. How deeply i need you my lord
english.segment3: Like the desert needs the rain i need you. Like the ocean needs the streams i need you. Like the morning needs the sun i need you. Lord you are my only one
